supplier_of: fruits and vegetables - import-export | melon | watermelon | fresh | fruit
information: Santiago Apóstol Cooperative was founded in 1971 by a small group of melon growers. It is located in Tomelloso, in the centre of La Mancha. The company has developed the commercialisation activity of fresh fruit and vegetables as much in the national market as in the international ones. Santiago Apóstol Cooperative has experienced since its beginnings a continuous evolution. This is due to its sustained and sustainable investments policy orientated to the permanent improvement and updating of its facilities. Nowadays we are more than 600 members committed with quality and with a high performance service. Our facilities are modern and functional. They represent a guarantee regarding the fact of making our products arrive in the best conditions to the final client. The manipulation and packaging industrial unit has a surface of 15.000m2. We also have two air and isolation chambers, as well as natural illumination and good air entrance. Referring to our production, we reach the figures of 15 to 20 million kg of melon every season and from 4 to 5 million kg of cereal. This year’s innovation have been the tomato crops in which we are very confident about the results.
keywords: Fruits and vegetables - import-export, Melon, Watermelon, Fresh, Fruit
